mapper.select: select bus_no, v.pf_station_id, h.pk_station_id, first_time, last_time, h.station_name, time_gap, lat, lng, way, zindex from ( select bus_no, pf_station_id, first_time, last_time, time_gap from tbl_bus where bus_no = #{bus_no} order by first_time asc )v cross join ( select pk_station_id, station_name, lat, lng, way, zindex from tbl_station )h where h.pk_station_id = v.pf_station_id order by v.first_time asc

WITH current_times AS ( select bus_no, v.pf_station_id, h.pk_station_id, first_time, last_time, h.station_name, time_gap, lat, lng, way, current_time, zindex from ( select bus_no, pf_station_id, TO_DATE(first_time, 'HH24:MI') AS first_time , TO_DATE(last_time, 'HH24:MI') AS last_time, time_gap , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS current_time from tbl_bus where bus_no = #{bus_no} order by first_time asc )v cross join ( select pk_station_id, station_name, lat, lng, way, zindex from tbl_station where pk_station_id=#{pf_station_id} )h where h.pk_station_id = v.pf_station_id order by v.first_time asc ) SELECT bus_no, pf_station_id, station_name, way, lat, lng, zindex, CASE
WHEN current_time < first_time THEN
ROUND((first_time - current_time) * 24 * 60)
WHEN current_time > last_time THEN
NULL ELSE ROUND( (time_gap - MOD( (current_time - first_time) * 24 * 60, time_gap )) ) END AS minutes_until_next_bus FROM current_times
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_car(car_seq, fk_empid, car_num, car_type, max_num, insurance, drive_year, license, car_imgfilename, car_orgimgfilename) values(car_seq.nextval, #{fk_empid}, #{car_num}, #{car_type}, #{max_num}, #{insurance}, #{drive_year}, #{license}, #{car_imgfilename}, #{car_orgimgfilename})

insert into tbl_day_share(res_num, fk_car_seq, start_date, last_date, dp_name, dp_add, dp_lat, dp_lng, start_time, ds_name, ds_add, ds_lat, ds_lng, want_max, end_status, cancel_status) values(res_num.nextval, #{car_seq}, #{start}, #{last}, #{departure_name}, #{departure_address}, #{dp_lat}, #{dp_lng}, #{startTime}, #{arrive_name}, #{arrive_address}, #{ds_lat}, #{ds_lng}, #{fk_cnum}, default, default)
mapper.select: select res_num, start_date, last_date, dp_name, ds_name, want_max, end_status, cancel_status, start_time, nickname from ( select res_num, start_date, last_date, dp_name, ds_name, want_max, end_status, cancel_status, start_time, fk_car_seq from tbl_day_share where end_status = 1 and cancel_status = 1 )a cross join ( select car_seq, fk_empid, car_num, car_type, max_num, nickname from ( select * from tbl_car ) v cross join ( select * from tbl_employees ) h where fk_empid = h.empid )b where fk_car_seq = b.car_seq
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_car_share(pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng) values(#{pf_res_num}, #{pf_empid}, #{share_date}, #{share_may_time}, default, #{rdp_name}, #{rdp_add}, #{rdp_lat}, #{rdp_lng}, #{rds_name}, #{rds_add}, #{rds_lat}, #{rds_lng})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_day_share where cancel_status = 1
and lower(dp_name) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(ds_name) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(#{start}) between start_date and last_date

select distinct dp_name
select distinct ds_name
from ( select fk_car_seq, dp_name, ds_name, cancel_status from tbl_day_share ) v cross join ( select empid, car_seq, nickname from tbl_car a join tbl_employees b on a.fk_empid = b.empid )h where h.car_seq = v.fk_car_seq and cancel_status = 1
and lower(dp_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(ds_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
order by dp_name desc
order by ds_name desc

select distinct dp_name
select distinct ds_name
from tbl_day_share
where lower(dp_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
where lower(ds_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
order by dp_name desc
order by ds_name desc

select res_num, start_date, last_date, dp_name, ds_name, want_max, end_status, cancel_status, start_time, nickname from ( select res_num, start_date, last_date, dp_name, ds_name, want_max, end_status, cancel_status, start_time, fk_car_seq from tbl_day_share where end_status = 1 and cancel_status = 1 )a cross join ( select car_seq, fk_empid, car_num, car_type, max_num, nickname from ( select * from tbl_car ) v cross join ( select * from tbl_employees where empid = #{empid} ) h where fk_empid = h.empid )b where fk_car_seq = b.car_seq

select count(*) from ( select res_num, start_date, last_date, dp_name, ds_name, want_max, end_status, cancel_status, start_time, fk_car_seq from tbl_day_share where end_status = 1 and cancel_status = 1 )a cross join ( select car_seq, fk_empid, car_num, car_type, max_num, nickname from ( select * from tbl_car ) v cross join ( select * from tbl_employees where empid = #{empid} ) h where fk_empid = h.empid )b where fk_car_seq = b.car_seq
and lower(dp_name) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(ds_name) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(#{start}) between start_date and last_date

select nickname, pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, email from ( select pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount from tbl_car_share where to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{date} )a cross join ( select nickname, empid, email from tbl_employees )b where pf_empid = empid
select count(*) from tbl_car_share where pf_res_num = #{res_num} and share_date = to_date(#{share_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT rno, pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, nickname, email FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY pf_res_num DESC) AS rno, pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, nickname, email FROM ( SELECT pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount FROM tbl_car_share where share_date = to_date(#{share_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and pf_res_num = #{res_num} ) a CROSS JOIN ( select nickname, empid, email from tbl_employees )b where pf_empid = empid ) C WHERE c.rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno} order by share_may_time asc
mapper.update: update tbl_car_share set accept_yon = #{accept_yon}, reason_nonaccept = #{deny_reason} where pf_res_num = #{pf_res_num} and pf_empid = #{pf_empid}
mapper.select: SELECT pf_res_num, pf_empid, to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, TO_CHAR(getin_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getin_time, TO_CHAR(getout_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, d.nickname as nickname_owner, e.nickname as nickname_applicant, e.email as email_applicant FROM tbl_car_share a JOIN tbl_day_share b ON a.pf_res_num = b.res_num JOIN tbl_car c ON b.fk_car_seq = c.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees d ON c.fk_empid = d.empid JOIN tbl_employees e ON a.pf_empid = e.empid WHERE c.fk_empid = #{empid} and a.accept_yon = 1

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_car_share a JOIN tbl_day_share b ON a.pf_res_num = b.res_num JOIN tbl_car c ON b.fk_car_seq = c.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees d ON c.fk_empid = d.empid JOIN tbl_employees e ON a.pf_empid = e.empid WHERE c.fk_empid = #{empid} and a.accept_yon = 1

SELECT rno, pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, nickname_owner, nickname_applicant ,email_applicant FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY pf_res_num DESC) AS rno, pf_res_num, pf_empid, to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, TO_CHAR(getin_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getin_time, TO_CHAR(getout_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, d.nickname as nickname_owner, e.nickname as nickname_applicant, e.email as email_applicant FROM tbl_car_share a JOIN tbl_day_share b ON a.pf_res_num = b.res_num JOIN tbl_car c ON b.fk_car_seq = c.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees d ON c.fk_empid = d.empid JOIN tbl_employees e ON a.pf_empid = e.empid WHERE c.fk_empid = #{empid} and a.accept_yon = 1 )h WHERE h.rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

SELECT pf_res_num, pf_empid, to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, TO_CHAR(getin_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getin_time, TO_CHAR(getout_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, d.nickname as nickname_owner, e.nickname as nickname_applicant FROM tbl_car_share a JOIN tbl_day_share b ON a.pf_res_num = b.res_num JOIN tbl_car c ON b.fk_car_seq = c.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees d ON c.fk_empid = d.empid JOIN tbl_employees e ON a.pf_empid = e.empid WHERE c.fk_empid = #{empid} and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.accept_yon = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_car_share a JOIN tbl_day_share b ON a.pf_res_num = b.res_num JOIN tbl_car c ON b.fk_car_seq = c.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees d ON c.fk_empid = d.empid JOIN tbl_employees e ON a.pf_empid = e.empid WHERE c.fk_empid = #{empid} AND to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.accept_yon = 1

SELECT rno, pf_res_num, pf_empid, share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, nickname_owner, nickname_applicant FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY pf_res_num DESC) AS rno, pf_res_num, pf_empid, to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, TO_CHAR(getin_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getin_time, TO_CHAR(getout_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount, d.nickname as nickname_owner, e.nickname as nickname_applicant FROM tbl_car_share a JOIN tbl_day_share b ON a.pf_res_num = b.res_num JOIN tbl_car c ON b.fk_car_seq = c.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees d ON c.fk_empid = d.empid JOIN tbl_employees e ON a.pf_empid = e.empid WHERE c.fk_empid = #{empid} AND to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.accept_yon = 1 ) h WHERE h.rno BETWEEN #{startRno} AND #{endRno}
mapper.update: update tbl_car_share set getin_time = to_date(#{getin_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where pf_res_num = #{pf_res_num} and pf_empid=#{pf_empid}

UPDATE tbl_car_share SET getout_time = TO_DATE(#{getout_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), use_time = CEIL((TO_DATE(#{getout_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - TO_DATE(#{getin_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) * 24 * 60), settled_amount = CEIL((TO_DATE(#{getout_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - TO_DATE(#{getin_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) * 24 * 60) * 10, nonpayment_amount = CEIL((TO_DATE(#{getout_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - TO_DATE(#{getin_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) * 24 * 60) * 10 WHERE pf_res_num = #{pf_res_num} AND pf_empid = #{pf_empid}
mapper.select: SELECT ils.nickname as nickname_owner, pf_res_num, pf_empid, to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount FROM tbl_car_share ilsj JOIN tbl_day_share ilcg ON ilsj.pf_res_num= ilcg.res_num JOIN tbl_car sci ON ilcg.fk_car_seq= sci.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees ils ON sci.fk_empid = ils.empid where pf_empid = #{empid}

SELECT ils.nickname as nickname_owner, ils.empid as empid_owner, pf_res_num, pf_empid, to_char(share_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as share_date, share_may_time, accept_yon, reason_nonaccept, rdp_name, rdp_add, rdp_lat, rdp_lng, rds_name, rds_add, rds_lat, rds_lng, getin_time, getout_time, use_time, settled_amount, payment_amount, nonpayment_amount FROM tbl_car_share ilsj JOIN tbl_day_share ilcg ON ilsj.pf_res_num= ilcg.res_num JOIN tbl_car sci ON ilcg.fk_car_seq= sci.car_seq JOIN tbl_employees ils ON sci.fk_empid = ils.empid where getin_time is not null and getout_time is not null and pf_empid = #{empid}
mapper.update: update tbl_employees set point = point - to_number(#{point}) where empid = #{empid}
update tbl_employees set point = point + to_number(#{point}) where empid = #{empid}
update tbl_car_share set nonpayment_amount = null, payment_amount = #{point} where pf_empid = #{empid}
